content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: EXTRT
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: TS.TSVAL
    - name: TS.TSPARMCD
      operator: starts_with
      value: TRT
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0104
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error if EXTRT is not the protocol-specified treatment
Outcome:
  Message: EXTRT is not a protocol-specified treatment
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Study
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0104
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Name of the protocol-specified study treatment given
                  during the dosing period for the observation.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 6.1.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - EX

json.Description: Trigger error if EXTRT is not the protocol-specified treatment

Outcome.Message: EXTRT is not a protocol-specified treatment

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Name of the protocol-specified study treatment given during the dosing period for the observation.
